column1: Raccoon^Male^procyon^spurts black ink at sender's eyes

column4: leaving a toony raccoon in their place!

column5: and zipping sender into the purple and blue costume! The zipper fades
column6: leaving sender a blue and purple dragon!

column2: before firing a thin vapor of yellow and black potion at sender

a bright light extending from the top of the machine
